CHECKER_SUCCESS: Aikin ka yayi kyau! An wuce.
FIRST_LESSON_MESSAGE: Kana kallon darasi na farko a wannan bangaren.
FINISH_LESSON_MESSAGE: Dole ne ka gama dukkan ayyuka kafin ka kammala!
COURSE_COMPLETE_MESSAGE: Murna! Ka kammala duk darussa na wannan bangaren.
JS_BEGINNER_DESC: Koyi JavaScript daga tushe zuwa matsayi — mataki-mataki tare da kalubale masu kayatarwa!
JS_BEGINNER_TASK_0_DESC:
Darasin Asalin JavaScript
JavaScript harshe ne na shirye-shiryen kwamfuta wanda yake baka damar sarrafa kwamfuta.

1. Sharhi (Comments) Don ka rubuta bayanin da kwamfuta ba za ta aiwatar ba, ka yi amfani da //. 
// Sharhi yana farawa da //
// Kwamfuta ba ta aiwatar da duk abin da ya fara da //
// Wannan domin kai ne ka gane abin da karka rubuta yake yi

2. Nuna Rubutu da Lambobi Don sa kwamfuta ta nuna rubutu, yi amfani da console.log():
console.log("Welcome")
Don nuna lamba:
console.log(100)

3. Canje-canje (Variables) Don ajiye rubutu ko lamba, yi amfani da let:
let name = "Ali";
let age = 20;

4. Ayyuka (Functions) Wannan aikin yana tara lambobi biyu:
function add(a, b) {
   return a + b;
}
Don kiran aikin:
let result = add(x, y);

5. Yanayin Sharadi (Condition Statements) Misali da if da else:
let a = 20;
let b = 2;

if (a > b) {
   console.log("a is greater than b")
} else {
    console.log("a is less than b")
}

6. Jeri (Arrays) Don ajiye abubuwa masu yawa, yi amfani da array:
let myeggs = [];
Tare da ƙimar farko:
let ages = [10, 22];
let shelf = ["book", "fruit", "bottle"];
Don samun abu daga ciki:
console.log(ages[1]); // 10
console.log(shelf[2]); // bottle
Tsawon array:
console.log(myeggs.length);
console.log(shelf.length);

7. Zagaye (Loops) Maimaiciwa da zagaye for...of:
for (let drawer of shelf) {
    console.log(drawer);
}

JavaScript harshe ne mai tasowa da yalwar fasali da za ka ci gaba da koya a darussa masu zuwa.
A wannan darasin, ka koyi menene JavaScript tare da cikakken taƙaitaccen bayani game da harshen.
JS_BEGINNER_TASK_1_DESC: Sa kwamfuta ta yi gaisuwa da nuna 'Assalam Alaykum'.
JS_BEGINNER_TASK_1_INITIAL: // TODO: Sa kwamfuta ta yi gaisuwa
JS_BEGINNER_TASK_1_HINT_1: Yi amfani da console.log() don nuna rubutu.
JS_BEGINNER_TASK_2_INITIAL: // TODO: Sa kwamfuta ta ce sunanta
JS_BEGINNER_TASK_2_HINT_1: Yi amfani da console.log() kamar yadda ka yi baya.
JS_BEGINNER_TASK_2_HINT_3: Rubuta jumlar daidai a cikin alamun zance.
JS_BEGINNER_TASK_3_DESC: Ajiye sunan kwamfuta da shekarunta cikin canje-canje.
JS_BEGINNER_TASK_3_HINT_1: Yi amfani da let don kirkirar canje-canje.
JS_BEGINNER_TASK_3_HINT_2: Yi amfani da = wajen bada kima.
JS_BEGINNER_TASK_3_HINT_3: Rubutu a cikin alamun zance, lambobi ba sa bukata.
JS_BEGINNER_TASK_4_DESC: Ajiye abubuwa a kabadan ɗakin kwana, kabadan kicin, da lambobin sadarwa.
JS_BEGINNER_TASK_4_INITIAL: // TODO: Ƙirƙirar arrays don kabad da lambobin sadarwa
JS_BEGINNER_TASK_4_HINT_1: Yi amfani da [] don ƙirƙirar array.
JS_BEGINNER_TASK_4_HINT_3: Lambobi ba sa buƙatar alamun zance, rubutu yana bukata.
JS_BEGINNER_TASK_5_DESC: Sa kwamfuta ta kwatanta shekarunta da naka ta nuna sakon da ya dace.
JS_BEGINNER_TASK_5_HINT_1: Yi amfani da if, else if, da else.
JS_BEGINNER_TASK_5_HINT_2: Yi amfani da == don kwatanta daidaito, ba = ba.
JS_BEGINNER_TASK_5_HINT_3: console.log() zai nuna sakonni daban-daban dangane da shekaru.
JS_BEGINNER_TASK_6_DESC: Sa kwamfuta ta faɗi sunanta sau 5 ta amfani da zagaye.
JS_BEGINNER_TASK_6_HINT_2: Fara i da 0, ci gaba yayin i < 5, ƙara i bayan kowane zagaye.
JS_BEGINNER_TASK_6_HINT_3: Yi amfani da + don haɗa rubutu da canje-canje.
JS_BEGINNER_TASK_7_DESC: Sa kwamfuta ta nuna duk abubuwan da ke cikin kabadan ɗaki ta amfani da zagaye.
JS_BEGINNER_TASK_7_HINT_1: Yi amfani da for...of wajen zagayawa a array.
JS_BEGINNER_TASK_7_HINT_3: Za ka iya kiran abu drawer ko duk sunan da kake so.
JS_BEGINNER_TASK_8_DESC: Nuna jimillar abubuwan da ke cikin kowane kabad da lambobin sadarwa.
AJMJS_BEGINNER_DESC: Koyi JavaScript daga mataki na farko zuwa sama — a hankali, cikin sauƙi, da wasanni masu ban sha'awa!
AJMJS_BEGINNER_TASK_0_DESC:
Darasin Farko na JavaScript
JavaScript wani harshe ne da muke amfani da shi don mu ba kwamfuta umarni.

1. Sharhi (Comments) Idan kana son rubuta abu da kwamfuta ba za ta karanta ba, ka yi amfani da //. 
// Sharhi yana farawa da // // Kwamfuta ba ta yin wannan // Yana taimaka maka ka tuna abin da kake yi

2. Nuna Rubutu da Lambobi Don ka nuna rubutu a kwamfuta, ka rubuta rubuta():
console.log(\"Welcome\")
Don ka nuna lamba:
console.log(100)

3. Canje-canje (Variables) Don ajiye suna ko lamba, ka yi amfani da let:
let name = \"Ali\"; let age = 20;

4. Aiki (Function) Wannan aikin yana haɗa lambobi biyu:
function add(a, b) { return a + b; }
Yadda ake kira aiki:
let result = add(x, y);

5. Idan… Kuma Idan Ba Haka Ba (Conditions) Misali:
let a = 20; let b = 2; if (a > b) { console.log(\"a ya fi b yawa\") } else { console.log(\"a ya yi ƙasa da b\") }

6. Jerin Abubuwa (Arrays) Ana amfani da array idan kana son ajiye abubuwa masu yawa:
let myeggs = [];
Misali:
let ages = [10, 22]; madadi shelf = [\"book\", \"fruit\", \"bottle\"];
Yadda ake karɓar abu:
console.log(ages[1]); // 10 console.log(shelf[2]); // bottle
Yawan abubuwa:
console.log(myeggs.length); console.log(shelf.length);

7. Maimaitawa (Loop) Domin karanta duk abubuwan cikin shelf:
for (let drawer of shelf) { console.log(drawer); }

JavaScript yana da abubuwa da yawa masu ban sha'awa da za ka koyo nan gaba.
A yau, ka koyi menene JavaScript da abubuwan da yake iya yi.
AJMJS_BEGINNER_TASK_2_HINT_3: Ka rubuta sakon a cikin quotes.
AJMJS_BEGINNER_TASK_3_HINT_2: Yi amfani da = don saka ƙima.
AJMJS_BEGINNER_TASK_3_HINT_3: Strings suna da quotes; lambobi basu da su.
AJMJS_BEGINNER_TASK_4_DESC: Ajiye abubuwa a kabadan ɗaki, kabadan kicin, da lambobin waya.
AJMJS_BEGINNER_TASK_5_DESC: Sanya kwamfuta ta kwatanta shekarunta da naka.
AJMJS_BEGINNER_TASK_5_HINT_1: Yi amfani da in, kokuma in, kokuma.
AJMJS_BEGINNER_TASK_6_DESC: Sanya kwamfuta ta ce sunanta sau 5.
AJMJS_BEGINNER_TASK_7_DESC: Nuna duk abubuwa a kabadan ɗaki.
AJMJS_BEGINNER_TASK_7_HINT_3: Za ka iya amfani da drawer ko wani suna.
AJMJS_BEGINNER_TASK_8_DESC: Nuna yawan abubuwa a kabadan da contacts.
